name: Stuffed N' Mashed Potatoes
effect:
Restores 26–30% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 450–790 HP every 5s for the next 30s.
description: An exquisitely colorful dish. Mash the potatoes into a fine creamy state, add various fillings in the middle, then finally, drizzle with sauce for a touch of brightness. The end result is not dissimilar from a finely-made cake, and is the favorite dish of many in Natlan.

suspicious.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.
suspicious.description: An exquisitely colorful dish. The colors are distinct, and the shape regular, promoting an anticipation that is choked in the crib by the bone-dry potato. Are you sure this is potato mash and not steamed egg yolks?

normal.effect: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.
normal.description: An exquisitely colorful dish. Mash the potatoes into a fine creamy state, add various fillings in the middle, then finally, drizzle with sauce for a touch of brightness. The end result is not dissimilar from a finely-made cake, and is the favorite dish of many in Natlan.

delicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.
delicious.description: An exquisitely colorful dish. The eye-catching colors and soft, delicate texture contain overlapping tastes that bump against your tastebuds in a flavor firework show. Such a perfect appetizer leaves you in unsurpassed anticipation for the main dish.
